ch.iserver.ace.net.core
Class MutableUserDetails

java.lang.Object
  ch.iserver.ace.UserDetails
      ch.iserver.ace.net.core.MutableUserDetails

public class MutableUserDetails
extends UserDetails

This class extends UserDetails for the network layer for more modification flexibility. Besdies, MutableUserDetails hold address and port information about the user.

See Also:
UserDetails
